text: Salsuginibacillus kocurii is a Gram-positive, moderately halophilic, alkalitolerant, endospore-forming, rod-shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Salsuginibacillus which has been isolated from sediments from Lake Chagannor in Mongolia. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Salsuginibacillus kocurii
